words.def: the short low gruff noise of the kind made by hogs
a crosspiece between the legs of a chair
Chinese tree bearing seeds that yield tung oil
A shallow, oval basket used for gardening.
a circular segment of a curve
large African antelope having a head with horns like an ox and a long tufted tail
a weapon that discharges a missile at high velocity (especially from a metal tube or barrel)
the part of the alimentary canal between the stomach and the anus
floor covering consisting of a piece of thick heavy fabric (usually with nap or pile)
a groove or furrow (especially one in soft earth caused by wheels)
a large vase that usually has a pedestal or feet
a large cask especially one holding a volume equivalent to 2 butts or 252 gals
a score in baseball made by a runner touching all four bases safely
an organization of independent states formed in 1945 to promote international peace and security
the local time at the 0 meridian passing through Greenwich, England
the 13th letter of the Greek alphabet
